income_messages:
From: m****h@aol.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-02-20 17:53:21
SUBJECT:  Access Bank of Nigeria Plc
 Access Bank of Nigeria Plc
Plot 999C. Danmole St, off Adeola
Odeku/Idejo St, Victoria Island, Lagos Nigeria.
                                                      US$12.3M CONTRACT/INHERITANCE PAYMENT
Attn: Fund Beneficiary,
I am Mr. Donald Ekeh, Director Foreign Remittance Department, Access Bank of Nigeria Plc. I resumed to this office on the 2nd of this month as the new Director Foreign Remittance, and during my official research yesterday I discovered an abandoned Contract/Inheritance payment file sum of US$12.3million with file number ''AB78U95227'' belonging to you as the legitimate beneficiary.
I carried out my investigation to know the reason why your payment file was abandoned, and i found out that the former director foreign remittance who left this office two months ago with-held your payment for his own selfish interest while he has paid the rest of the foreign beneficiaries, but little did he know that i will find out his hidden agenda.
Now that your payment file has been discovered and your US$12.3million is still intact and available for you to claim, get back to me as soon as possible to claim your payment.
We have four methods of payment; (1) ATM MasterCard method of payment (2) Diplomatic Delivery method of payment (3) Online Banking method of payment, and (4) Bank to Bank Wire Transfer method of payment.
Kindly provide to me your following details and let me know which of the above listed methods of payment you want to receive your US$12.3million Contract/Inheritance Payment.
Beneficiary's Full Name:..........
Home Address:..............
Telephone Number:.................
Date of Birth:...................
Occupation:.....................
Company Name (If Any):.....................
Company Address:..................
I.D No:......................
Next of Kin (If Any):.......................
Address of Next of Kin:......................
Thanks for your anticipated understanding. We will serve you better.
I'm looking forward to your response.
Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Donald Ekeh
Director Foreign Remittance Dept,
Access Bank of Nigeria Plc
Plot 999C. Danmole St, off Adeola
Odeku/Idejo St, Victoria Island, Lagos Nigeria.
Tel: +2348144579447 Call, SMS/WhatsApp
